title: Akbari masjid Ajmer Sharief
review: Ajmer is only famous for the sepulcher of Hazrat Khwaja Moinuddin Chishty, a saint much respected by the Mughals.

title: Akbari masjid.. mosque inside the dargha...
review: Akbari masjid is a mosque located inside the dargha in the name of the great mughal ruler Akbar. Once you are inside the dargha you will visit this place and can have namaz tgere. It's told that the large wells for making food for the common people located on either side of the dargha is made by him. Altogether it's a must visit place for the travellers.

title: Nice Masjid
review: Akbari Masjid is located between Shahjahani gate and Buland Darwaza in Dargah Sharif.Mughal emperor Akbar built this mosque when his prayers for a heir at the Dargah sharif were answered.This mosque is made of green and white marbles.Generally crowded with peoples.

title: in Dargah
review: Akbari Masjid is nice holy place. This Masjid Was in built in Mughal Era. This Masjid is located  in Dargah.

title: Dargah shariff part
review: Akbari masjid is most important part of dargah shariff of Ajmer.this is beautiful holy place.must see

title: Akbari Masjid
review: he Jama Masjid (Mosque) of Amber on the outskirts of Jaipur City in India's Rajasthan state. It more popular locally as Akbari Masjid. According the ASI's board inside the masjid premises, 'It a is rectangular on plan having lofty central dome flanked by two small domes on either side. It is entered through small gateways provided at three sides. The courtyard in front of the mosque has an ablution tanks. Four high minars built on the corners enhance its beauty. The mosque has five arched screes and deep mihrab on the western wall. Interior of domes were decorated with geometric designs and paintings, traces of which are still visible. An inscription in Persian on the left side of the central arch informs us about its construction by Raja Bharmal on the order of Emperor Akbar in A.H.977 (AD 1569)'.

title: Great...
review: This masjid situated inside Dargah Shariff, built by Badshah Akbar. This mosque is built by white marble. Too much crowd.

title: Masha Allah Great Mosque
review: Its one of the biggest mosques located inside darga sharif, with great peace over there .must visit and pray there.

title: Beautiful Masjid with White Marble
review: This is located inside the Dargah built by Badshah Akbar when he requested a heir for himself. Great place and clean and neatly managed. You can visit it when you go for the Darshan, Nice place to take photos too.

title: Interesting place to visit
review: The beautiful green and white masjid is inside the Dargah Shariff grounds.  Lots of people there when we visited. Many stalls selling flowers and things for offerings.

title: Marvellous!
review: Its a mughal architecture! The Mughal emperor Akbar built this mosque to express his gratitude towards the Sultan Al Hind! Its a calm and quite place where one can pray peacefully and stay back from the crowd round the Dargah Sharief!

title: excellent masjid
review: here you can attend your namaz ,its in excellent condition and beautifully built by akbar ,this masjid is near to buland darwajah(gate)

title: nice place to visit
review: the masjid was good and having some light show. this place was suggested by the hotel where we stayed i.e hotel payal which was very close to the hotel . it was good to visit the place and having such experience

title: beautiful masjid
review: located in the dargah premises,is the old mosque in ajmer.nice and peaceful place.one should go there for namaz

title: Worship Place
review: The Masjid is inside the dargah sharif complex well maintained and clean place. One can go and offer namaz.

title: A Mosque located inside the Dargah premises
review: The Akbari Masjid is located inside the Dargah premises. The mosque was built by Emperor Akbar and is of historical importance. Daily namaaz is offered here. So do be alive to the people's sensitivities so as not to interrupt the people offering namaaz when visiting this place.

title: Absolute outsider
review: Absolute outsider

title: "The Mosque Inside The Dargah"
review: Built by Mughal emperor Akbar in d olden days its located in Ajmer Dargah n built by using Beautiful Rajasthani Marbles. Here you can Attend your Namaz

title: The sacred place for the seekers
review: Located at the Dargah Sharif this place is too sacred and full of piety . The usual crowds can be expected . After you come out of the main shrine of the Garib Nawaz - the walk here bring s out natural humbleness of each who come here . The feast for the faithfuls is never ending prayers here . Must experience it - not for a hurried tourist .

title: Part of the main dargah
review: Your visit to the dargah will cover this masjid. You may easily chose to skip the place if paucity of time is there

title: Very serene and calm place
review: Akbari Masjid was constructed by Emperor Akbar as a token of his Devotion and Gratitude on the occasion of the birth of prince Salim (Jahangir) in the year 1455 A.D. Akbari Masjid is located between Shahjahani Gate and Buland Darwaza in Dargah Sharif. The mosque is made up of green and white marbles.

title: Very Serene and Calm
review: this place is a Quranic Educational Institution to provide religious education to the children. It’s a very serene and calm place where one could sit & pray peacefully.

title: Built by Emperor Akbar
review: Built by mughal emperor akbar in d olden days its located in d ajmer dargah n built by using beautiful rajasthani marbles. Its beautiful n very peaceful. U cn go thr n sit for hours n feel at peace with life.
